company.tagline: The future of home help is here
company.description: Figure is the first-of-its-kind AI robotics company bringing a general purpose humanoid to life. The intelligence behind Figure 03 is AI that enables it to navigate unpredictable, ever-changing home environments. Human-shaped and AI-powered, Figure handles household tasks the way you would.

funding_rounds.source: Figure Exceeds $1B in Series C Funding at $39B Post-Money Valuation

recent_partnerships: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield

events.title: Figure Exceeds $1B in Series C Funding
events.description: Figure closed its Series C funding round, surpassing $1 billion, with a post-money valuation of $39 billion.

events.title: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield
events.description: Figure established a strategic partnership with Brookfield to enhance its operations and reach.

events.title: Introducing Figure 03
events.description: Figure officially launched the F.03 version of its humanoid, designed for home use with numerous improvements.

events.title: Scaling Helix: a New State of the Art in Humanoid Logistics
events.description: Figure unveiled a new scaling strategy for its Helix technology, aimed at enhancing humanoid logistics capabilities.

events.title: BotQ: A High-Volume Manufacturing Facility for Humanoid Robots
events.description: Figure announced the establishment of BotQ, a facility dedicated to high-volume manufacturing of humanoid robots.

events.title: Helix Accelerating Real-World Logistics
events.description: Figure achieved significant progress in real-world logistics applications using its Helix technology.

events.title: Helix: A Vision-Language-Action Model for Generalist Humanoid Control
events.description: Figure introduced a new model for generalist humanoid control, advancing its Helix platform's capabilities.

events.title: F.01 Takes First Steps
events.description: The first generation robot F.01 took its first steps, marking a significant milestone in Figure's development journey.

funding_rounds.source: Figure Exceeds $1B in Series C Funding at $39B Post-Money Valuation
